text: Arnold Ralph Cooperman was a three-time Olympic foil and sabre fencer from England. He was born on November 16, 1927 and died on March 22, 2009.Ralph Cooperman == References == Category:1927 births Category:2009 deaths Category:British fencers Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:Sportspeople from London Category:People from the London Borough of Hackney
title: Ralph Cooperman
